list.name: Default
list.comment: Added Test project and restructured code organization to allow for subprojects. Added gtest and gmock to engine_tests.

task.summary: Fixed Update loop in renderer. Added Event Handler and Observer for Events. Added EventType for wrapping SDL Events.
SdlKeyEvent and ListenerType enums added. Game class now handles Observer Subscription. GLWindow pumps events out to Key Handlers.
Added Test project and restructured code organization to allow for subprojects. Added gtest and gmock to engine_tests.

MESSAGE.value: Added SDL2 Locally to the project. Added SDL2 to CMake in a Cross-Plat way.
Fixed Update loop in renderer. Added Event Handler and Observer for Events. Added EventType for wrapping SDL Events.
SdlKeyEvent and ListenerType enums added. Game class now handles Observer Subscription. GLWindow pumps events out to Key Handlers.
Added Test project and restructured code organization to allow for subprojects. Added gtest and gmock to engine_tests.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Added Test project and restructured code organization to allow for subprojects. Added gtest and gmock to engine_tests.
